headline: 15-Year PG&E Leader Alejandro 'Alex' Vallejo Named Chief People Officer, Will Continue to Build Culture of Safety, Joy for Coworkers and Customers
summary: Alejandro "Alex" Vallejo has been named Executive Vice President, Chief People Officer of PG&E Corporation and its subsidiary, Pacific Gas and Electric Company (together, "PG&E"), effective Sept. 30. Vallejo has been a leader at PG&E for the past 15 years.
